{0: ['true'], 1: ['false']}
./checkpoints/rte/meta-llama/Llama-2-7b-hf/swap_labels/retrieval_icl-seed-1-shot-8_instructor/swap_labels_log.csv
<textattack.attacker.Attacker object at 0x7f607f3d5df0>
Attack(
  (search_method): GreedySearch
  (goal_function):  UntargetedClassification
  (transformation):  CompositeTransformation(
    (0): WordSwapLabel(
        (label_map):  ['true', 'false']
      )
    )
  (constraints): 
    (0): MaxWordsPerturbed(
        (max_percent):  0.5
        (compare_against_original):  True
      )
    (1): InstructionModification(
        (columns_to_ignore):  ['sentence', 'example_', 'premise', 'hypothesis']
      )
    (2): RepeatModification
  (is_black_box):  True
)

Examples ['the experiment helped establish that the bacteria came first, causing inflammation, then ulcers.\n The question is: inflammation is the result of ulcers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'obesity is medically accepted to be a disease in its own right.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the gastric bypass operation, also known as stomach stapling, has become the most common surgical procedure for treating obesity.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'consumers who take any of the contaminated pills could suffer minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat, the fda said, adding that the risk of serious injury was remote.\n The question is: contaminated pills could cause minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'gastrointestinal bleeding can happen as an adverse effect of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs such as aspirin or ibuprofen.\n The question is: aspirin prevents gastrointestinal bleeding.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "other drugs on the market, approved to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's, are believed to work by inhibiting cholinesterase, an enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine which is a chemical used by nerves to communicate with each other.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'humans have won notable battles in the war against infection - and antibiotics are still powerful weapons - but nature has evolution on its side, and the war against bacterial diseases is by no means over.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'beth israel is fighting back in the lab, where bacteria taken from patients are grown in cultures and tested against antibiotics to determine if the bug beats the drug.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fast forward a decade or two and scientists began to notice antibiotic-resistant strains of bacteria.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'well, the yolk is on us, the bacteria are winning, and at a record pace.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'when patients interrupt a course of antibiotics, the surviving bacteria return with a vengeance, often having rapidly mutated to resist the therapy.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the drug, along with aspirin and ibuprofen, is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.\n The question is: aspirin is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "byrraju ramalinga raju, founder and chairman of satyam computer services, and his brother, b. rama raju, the company's managing director, were arrested late friday by andhra pradesh police. the brothers were placed under judicial custody in a hyderabad, india jail and will remain there until january 23. facing charges of criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.\n The question is: raju has hepatitis-c.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. "alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.", 'hypothesis': "alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.', 'hypothesis': 'bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'humans have won notable battles in the war against infection - and antibiotics are still powerful weapons - but nature has evolution on its side, and the war against bacterial diseases is by no means over.', 'hypothesis': 'bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'beth israel is fighting back in the lab, where bacteria taken from patients are grown in cultures and tested against antibiotics to determine if the bug beats the drug.', 'hypothesis': 'bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'fast forward a decade or two and criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.", 'hypothesis': 'raju has hepatitis-c.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'polio is no longer a serious health problem Examples ['the experiment helped establish that the bacteria came first, causing inflammation, then ulcers.\n The question is: inflammation is the result of ulcers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'obesity is medically accepted to be a disease in its own right.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the gastric bypass operation, also known as stomach stapling, has become the most common surgical procedure for treating obesity.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'consumers who take any of the contaminated pills could suffer minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat, the fda said, adding that the risk of serious injury was remote.\n The question is: contaminated pills could cause minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'gastrointestinal bleeding can happen as an adverse effect of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs such as aspirin or ibuprofen.\n The question is: aspirin prevents gastrointestinal bleeding.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "other drugs on the market, approved to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's, are believed to work by inhibiting cholinesterase, an enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine which is a chemical used by nerves to communicate with each other.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'humans have won notable battles in the war against infection - and antibiotics are still powerful weapons - but nature has evolution on its side, and the war against bacterial diseases is by no means over.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'beth israel is fighting back in the lab, where bacteria taken from patients are grown in cultures and tested against antibiotics to determine if the bug beats the drug.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fast forward a decade or two and scientists began to notice antibiotic-resistant strains of bacteria.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'well, the yolk is on us, the bacteria are winning, and at a record pace.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'when patients interrupt a course of antibiotics, the surviving bacteria return with a vengeance, often having rapidly mutated to resist the therapy.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the drug, along with aspirin and ibuprofen, is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.\n The question is: aspirin is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "byrraju ramalinga raju, founder and chairman of satyam computer services, and his brother, b. rama raju, the company's managing director, were arrested late friday by andhra pradesh police. the brothers were placed under judicial custody in a hyderabad, india jail and will remain there until january 23. facing charges of criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.\n The question is: raju has hepatitis-c.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'obesity is medically accepted to be a disease in its own right.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the gastric bypass operation, also known as stomach stapling, has become the most common surgical procedure for treating obesity.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'consumers who take any of the contaminated pills could suffer minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat, the fda said, adding that the risk of serious injury was remote.\n The question is: contaminated pills could cause minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'gastrointestinal bleeding can happen as an adverse effect of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs such as aspirin or ibuprofen.\n The question is: aspirin prevents gastrointestinal bleeding.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "other drugs on the market, approved to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's, are believed to work by inhibiting cholinesterase, an enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine which is a chemical used by nerves to communicate with each other.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'humans have won notable battles in the war against infection - and antibiotics are still powerful weapons - but nature has evolution on its side, and the war against bacterial diseases is by no means over.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'beth israel is fighting back in the lab, where bacteria taken from patients are grown in cultures and tested against antibiotics to determine if the bug beats the drug.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fast forward a decade or two and scientists began to notice antibiotic-resistant strains of bacteria.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'well, the yolk is on us, the bacteria are winning, and at a record pace.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'when patients interrupt a course of antibiotics, the surviving bacteria return with a vengeance, often having rapidly mutated to resist the therapy.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the drug, along with aspirin and ibuprofen, is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.\n The question is: aspirin is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "byrraju ramalinga raju, founder and chairman of satyam computer services, and his brother, b. rama raju, the company's managing director, were arrested late friday by andhra pradesh police. the brothers were placed under judicial custody in a hyderabad, india jail and will remain there until january 23. facing charges of criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.\n The question is: raju has hepatitis-c.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'obesity is medically accepted to be a disease in its own right.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the gastric bypass operation, also known as stomach stapling, has become the most common surgical procedure for treating obesity.\n The question is: obesity is medically treated.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'consumers who take any of the contaminated pills could suffer minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat, the fda said, adding that the risk of serious injury was remote.\n The question is: contaminated pills could cause minor stomach discomfort or possible cuts to the mouth and throat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'gastrointestinal bleeding can happen as an adverse effect of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs such as aspirin or ibuprofen.\n The question is: aspirin prevents gastrointestinal bleeding.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "other drugs on the market, approved to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's, are believed to work by inhibiting cholinesterase, an enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine which is a chemical used by nerves to communicate with each other.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'humans have won notable battles in the war against infection - and antibiotics are still powerful weapons - but nature has evolution on its side, and the war against bacterial diseases is by no means over.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'beth israel is fighting back in the lab, where bacteria taken from patients are grown in cultures and tested against antibiotics to determine if the bug beats the drug.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fast forward a decade or two and scientists began to notice antibiotic-resistant strains of bacteria.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'well, the yolk is on us, the bacteria are winning, and at a record pace.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'when patients interrupt a course of antibiotics, the surviving bacteria return with a vengeance, often having rapidly mutated to resist the therapy.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the drug, along with aspirin and ibuprofen, is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.\n The question is: aspirin is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "byrraju ramalinga raju, founder and chairman of satyam computer services, and his brother, b. rama raju, the company's managing director, were arrested late friday by andhra pradesh police. the brothers were placed under judicial custody in a hyderabad, india jail and will remain there until january 23. facing charges of criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.\n The question is: raju has hepatitis-c.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'gastrointestinal bleeding can happen as an adverse effect of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs such as aspirin or ibuprofen.\n The question is: aspirin prevents gastrointestinal bleeding.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "other drugs on the market, approved to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's, are believed to work by inhibiting cholinesterase, an enzyme that breaks down acetylcholine which is a chemical used by nerves to communicate with each other.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "alzheimer's disease is successfully treated, and controlled by drugs which inhibit the synthesis of beta-amyloid protein.\n The question is: alzheimer's disease is treated using drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1983, mcclintock found that bacteria have rings of dna (plasmids) that reproduce and have genetic changes that tell the bacteria how to defend itself against the antibiotics.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'well, the yolk is on us, the bacteria are winning, and at a record pace.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'when patients interrupt a course of antibiotics, the surviving bacteria return with a vengeance, often having rapidly mutated to resist the therapy.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the drug, along with aspirin and ibuprofen, is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.\n The question is: aspirin is one of the most widely used pain relievers available without a doctor's note.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "byrraju ramalinga raju, founder and chairman of satyam computer services, and his brother, b. rama raju, the company's managing director, were arrested late friday by andhra pradesh police. the brothers were placed under judicial custody in a hyderabad, india jail and will remain there until january 23. facing charges of criminal breach of trust (section 406 of ipc), criminal conspiracy (section 120-b), cheating (section 420), falsification of records and forgery (section 468), and fraudulent cancellation of securities (section 477-a), they face up to ten years imprisonment if convicted.\n The question is: raju has hepatitis-c.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'polio is no longer a serious health problem for people living in the developed nations, such as the united states, germany, or france.\n The question is: polio is under control in the world.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fast forward a decade or two and scientists began to notice antibiotic-resistant strains of bacteria.\n The question is: bacteria is winning the war against antibiotics.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'on may 17, 2005, the national assembly of kuwait passed, by a majority of 35 to 23 (with 1 abstention), an amendment to its electoral law that would allow women to vote and to stand as parliamentary candidates.\n The question is: a pro-women amendment was rejected by the national assembly of kuwait.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'some of these kinds of violence continue to be perpetrated by certain individuals and groups in the new iraq.   mahmoud continued, "in the last six months at least eight women have been killed in mosul alone - all apparently by islamic groups clamping down on female independence. among these, a professor from the city\'s law school was shot and beheaded, a vet was killed on her way to work, and a pharmacist from the alkhansah hospital was shot dead on her doorstep."\n The question is: women in iraq have lost their freedom.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', '"having for years enjoyed greater rights than other women in the middle east, women in iraq are now losing even their basic freedoms. the right to choose their clothes, the right to love or marry whom they want. of course women suffered under saddam. i fled his cruel regime. i personally witnessed much brutality, but the subjugation of women was never a goal of the baath party."\n The question is: women in iraq have lost their freedom.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
