bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.", 'hypothesis': "christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.', 'hypothesis': 'a small bronze Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.', 'hypothesis': 'prince charles owns an estate in bristol.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.', 'hypothesis': 'a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.', 'hypothesis': 'pope john paul ii died.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.', 'hypothesis': 'daily telegraph is sold.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.", 'hypothesis': "christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.', 'hypothesis': 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
