Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, {'premise': 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.", 'hypothesis': "christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.', 'hypothesis': 'a small bronze Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, {'premise': 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.', 'hypothesis': 'prince charles owns an estate in bristol.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['councilman pierce said he was advised that the car belonged to james clark, 68, an acquaintance of the jones family.\n The question is: councilman pierce owns a car.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in £3.2m.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'treasures belonging to hollywood legend katharine hepburn have raised £3.2m at a two-day auction in america.\n The question is: a two-day auction of property belonging to actress katharine hepburn brought in 3.2 million pounds.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'gm has initiated criminal investigations in germany and the us on the basis of their suspicions that mr lopez and his team stole confidential information before defecting to vw in march.\n The question is: lopez took documents from gm to vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "los angeles mayor james hahn, along with top members of the automobile club of southern california, along with will announce the kickoff of a $9 billion plan to fund los angeles county's top ten traffic busters.\n The question is: james hahn is a member of the automobile club of southern california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the interest of the automotive industry increases and the first amplifier project, a four-channel output module for the german car manufacturer, porsche, is finished.\n The question is: porsche is a german car manufacturer.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the news comes as the owners of kilroot announced plans to install clean-up equipment at the plant near carrickfergus at a cost of â£35 million.\n The question is: owners announced plans to sell clean-up equipment.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hugh was also very supportive of mustang\'s plan to become fuhrer, doing whatever he can to, as he put it, to "help him from the bottom to the top."\n The question is: hugh assisted mustang.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police were called to the highgrove house, the home belonging to prince charles and his wife camilla on tuesday night after police received a call that there was an intruder on the property. "he was detained within the grounds and did not gain access to any buildings," said a spokesperson for the police, tony rymer. a spokesperson for the estate refused to comment to the media calling it "a matter for the police" and that any comments on the intrusion should be given through them. according to a gloucester police spokeswoman, a man from bristol, england was arrested after wielding a pitchfork around the property. the name of the 55-year-old has not been released, but police charged him with trespassing. he was later released after posting bail. camilla and charles, who were both present and sleeping on the estate at the time, were not injured.\n The question is: prince charles owns an estate in bristol.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the bank of italy, the ultimate arbiter of italian banking mergers, has been engulfed by scandal since police wire taps revealed fazio and his wife advised a local banker in a bid for bank antonveneta against dutch bank abn amro.\n The question is: a local banker bids for bank antonveneta.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a place of sorrow, after pope john paul ii died, became a place of celebration, as roman catholic faithful gathered in downtown chicago to mark the installation of new pope benedict xvi.\n The question is: pope john paul ii died.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "sotheby's and christie's, the world's two most powerful auction houses, swapped confidential lists of super-rich clients who were spared from paying fees charged to other sellers, people close to the companies and to a federal antitrust investigation of them said.\n The question is: christie's is one of the world's largest auction houses.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'a small bronze bust of spencer tracy sold for £174,000.\n The question is: a small bronze bust of spencer tracy made £180,447.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.', 'hypothesis': 'the european single currency was introduced in 1999.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.', 'hypothesis': 'mrs hobday departs london.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.', 'hypothesis': 'the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.', 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
