Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.', 'hypothesis': 'the hercules transporter 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.', 'hypothesis': 'the european single currency was introduced in 1999.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.', 'hypothesis': 'mrs hobday departs london.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health 'false'}, {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the hercules 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.', 'hypothesis': 'the european single currency was introduced in 1999.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.', 'hypothesis': 'mrs hobday departs london.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.', 'hypothesis': 'the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.', 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.', 'hypothesis': 'the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.', 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
