Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. plane made a flight to pakistan.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.', 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and {'premise': "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.", 'hypothesis': 'nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.', 'hypothesis': 'the hercules transporter 'hypothesis': 'the british government banned flights to kenya.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.', 'hypothesis': 'the european single currency was introduced in 1999.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.', 'hypothesis': 'mrs hobday departs london.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."', 'hypothesis': 'a case of rabies was confirmed.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a pet must have rabies Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the treaty requires that members comply with guidelines on deficits, public debt and other fiscal benchmarks by the end of 1997 if they are to qualify for taking part in the introduction of a new, single european currency in 1999.\n The question is: the european single currency was introduced in 1999.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'unfortunately, a visit from mrs hobday, causes mr browne to leave for london.\n The question is: mrs hobday departs london.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the unconfirmed case in dundee concerns a rabies-like virus known only in bats.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'this case of rabies in western newfoundland is the first case confirmed on the island since 1989.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'if confirmed as rabies, the case could be the first occurence of the infection acquired in the uk since 1902.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a pet must have rabies protection confirmed by a blood test.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'public health and animal health officials from the departments of health and community services and forest resources and agrifoods today confirmed a rabies case involving a red fox in western newfoundland.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "nineteen of the european union's 25 member states were voting in the biggest transnational elections ever held, and the first for the eu since the bloc's expansion into the former communist eastern europe on may 1.\n The question is: nearly 350 million people were eligible to vote since the eu took in 10 new members on may 1.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hercules transporter plane which flew straight here from the first round of the trip in pakistan, touched down and it was just a brisk 100m stroll to the handshakes.\n The question is: the hercules transporter plane made a flight to pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the decision by the british government to suspend flights to kenya is regrettable, it plays into the hands of terrorists.\n The question is: the british government banned flights to kenya.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'no case of indigenously acquired rabies infection has been confirmed in man or any animal species during the past 2 years.\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'drew walker, nhs tayside\'s public health director, said: "it is important to stress that this is not a confirmed case of rabies."\n The question is: a case of rabies was confirmed.. Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "kozlowski and the company's former chief financial officer, mark swartz, were sentenced, on monday, to up to 25 years in prison.\n The question is: two former bosses of us manufacturer, tyco, have been sentenced to up to 25 years in jail for stealing more than $150m (£m) from the company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'martha stewart, 64, is back, after serving five months in a west virginia federal prison for lying about a 2001 stock sale.\n The question is: martha stewart was convicted of lying about a stock trade and served five months in prison.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'former peruvian president alberto fujimori has been sentenced to 25 years in jail for ordering killings and kidnappings by security forces. at the end of a 15-month trial, judges found him guilty of two death-squad killings of 25 people during the conflict with guerrillas in the 1990s. after being sentenced, mr fujimori said he would appeal against the verdict. human rights group amnesty international described the verdict as "a milestone in the fight for justice".\n The question is: alberto fujimori has been sentenced to life in prison.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'two other marines, tyler jackson and john jodka iii, have already pleaded guilty to aggravated assault and conspiracy to obstruct justice and were sentenced to 21 months and 18 months, respectively.\n The question is: tyler jackson has been sentenced to 18 months.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a u.s. soldier accused of participating in the rape of an iraqi girl and then killing her and her family was sentenced to 90 years in jail on thursday, media reports said.\n The question is: a u.s. soldier was sentenced to 90 years in jail.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'hacking reported his wife missing on july 19, a monday.\n The question is: mark hacking was booked into the salt lake county jail on monday.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'nichols, 49, was convicted in the april 19, 1995, bombing of the alfred p. murrah federal building in oklahoma city.\n The question is: nichols was sentenced to life in prison for the april 19, 1995, bombing of the oklahoma city federal building.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "gm established grounds for suspicion of industrial spying by presenting affidavits from its employees. the aim will be to determine if vw's project was copied from gm data - essential if industrial espionage is to be proved.\n The question is: there was an industrial espionage case involving gm and vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the industrial espionage case involving gm and vw began with the hiring of jos ignacio lopez, an employee of gm subsidiary adam opel, by vw as production director.\n The question is: there was an industrial espionage case involving gm and vw.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'state police issued bulletins via teletype requesting patrols to be on the lookout for robert senacal, 35, of cortlandt manor.\n The question is: robert senacal was arrested by police.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'in documents they filed with the u.s. district court for the district of columbia, government lawyers argued that three inmates who committed suicide last month by hanging themselves coordinated their actions by using attorney-client confidentiality to communicate with each other. government officials said that among papers marked "attorney client privilege" were instructions on how to tie knots and a classified memo on camp activities and inmate locations.\n The question is: three people committed suicide in jail.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'zhao, who died at 85, was a reformer who was removed from office, and imprisoned, in 1989 after denouncing the use of force against student protesters in tiananmen square.\n The question is: zhao was arrested in 1989.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a priest who served in the diocese of metuchen in the mid-1980s has been sentenced to life in prison for sexually abusing a massachusetts boy.\n The question is: pedophile gets life in prison. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'former peruvian president alberto fujimori has been sentenced to 25 years in jail for ordering killings and kidnappings by security forces. at the end of a 15-month trial, judges found him guilty of two death-squad killings of 25 people during the conflict with guerrillas in the 1990s. after being sentenced, mr fujimori said he would appeal against the verdict. human rights group amnesty international described the verdict as "a milestone in the fight for justice".\n The question is: alberto fujimori has been sentenced to life in prison..
